Text.val: -- Created: 04.06.2013 (SCR18173) (Based on previous BXA490 version where XML files were created and send via Taminio)
15.01.2014 SH SCR18631 Changed GNRD(85) to GNRD(138) and removed subdirectory logic
... delimeter between output fields --> '|' = CHR(124) = HEX 7C
-- Convert string parameter to FL picture
-- Start producing files if no error occurs
... get mail address to deliver the created files
... store dummy VT01 rows for supply chain finance for use in BXA494,495,496
... set column delimiter (pipe), used to create the files
-- BXA491 Grid Organisation Data file (incl. BXA494)
-- BXA492 Grid Local / global data file (incl. BXA495)
-- BXA493 Grid Cross-reference data file (incl. BXA496)
-- If PI.DATE = 0/null then init with GNRL_DEBTORSLISTDATE
.. in case of directory does not exists --> MSGW

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DHIC.DHIC_ID from :1/DHIC DHIC where DHIC.DHIC_INFS_CODE = 'G' and exists(select * from :1/DEBC DEBC, :1/ADMN ADMN where DEBC.DEBC_DEBH = DHIC.DHIC_DEBH and DEBC.DEBC_DATDELETED is null and DEBC.DEBC_ADMNO=ADMN.ADMN_NO and ADMN.ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE ='Y') for fetch only

select CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO, CLNT806_ING_GRID_ID, CLNT103_COMM_CLNTNO, CLNT115_NAME1_MAIL, CLNT115_NAME2_MAIL from :1/clnt join :1/admn admn1 on CLNT101_ADMNO=admn1.ADMN_NO and admn1.ADMN_VORTEXREPORTING = 'Y' where CLNT102_CLNTNO <> 99999 and CLNT102_CLNTNO <> 99998 and CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT <> 2 and CLNT804_TYPEOFINVESTMENT <> 10 and CLNT804_TYPEOFINVESTMENT <> 13 and ( CLNT804_TYPEOFINVESTMENT<> 14 or CLNT804_TYPEOFINVESTMENT = 14 and CLNT103_COMM_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO) and (admn1.ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = 'N' or admn1.ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = 'Y' and exists (select * from :1/SREG where SREG_ID = admn1.ADMN_SREG_ID and SREG_CDD_BUYER = 'Y')) order by CLNT806_ING_GRID_ID,case when CLNT108_ACC_CURR = admn1.ADMN_CURRENCY then CLNT108_ACC_CURR else 'ZZZ' end, CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO for fetch only

Text.val: ... if CHR(13) not exists, maybe last line, use max. number of possible

SQL_STMT_U.val: select GRID.GRID_LOCALCUSTOMERID, GRID.GRID_NAME from :1/GRID GRID where exists(select * from :1/VT01 where VT01_DATE = ':2' and VT01_CLNTNO = 0 and GRID.GRID_ID = VT01_INGGRIDID) for fetch only

select CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO, CLNT806_ING_GRID_ID, CLNT103_COMM_CLNTNO, CLNT111_ADR, CLNT112_ZIP, CLNT113_CITY, CLNT114_COUNTRY, CLNT804_RISKRATING, CLNT806_INDUSTRYCODE, CLNT806_CUSTOMERTYPE, CLNT806_SEGMENTATION from :1/clnt join :1/admn admn1 on CLNT101_ADMNO=admn1.ADMN_NO and admn1.ADMN_VORTEXREPORTING = 'Y' where CLNT102_CLNTNO <> 99999 and CLNT102_CLNTNO <> 99998 and CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT <> 2 and CLNT804_TYPEOFINVESTMENT <> 10 and CLNT804_TYPEOFINVESTMENT <> 13 and ( CLNT804_TYPEOFINVESTMENT<> 14 or CLNT804_TYPEOFINVESTMENT = 14 and CLNT103_COMM_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO) and (admn1.ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = 'N' or admn1.ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = 'Y' and exists (select * from :1/SREG where SREG_ID = admn1.ADMN_SREG_ID and SREG_CDD_BUYER = 'Y')) order by CLNT806_ING_GRID_ID, case when CLNT108_ACC_CURR = admn1.ADMN_CURRENCY then CLNT108_ACC_CURR else 'ZZZ' end, CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO for fetch only

select GRID.GRID_CITY, GRID.GRID_COUNTRY, GRID.GRID_RISKRATING, GRID.GRID_LOCALCUSTOMERID, GRID.GRID_CUSTOMERTYPE, GRID.GRID_INDUSTRYCODE, GRID.GRID_SEGMENTATION, GRID.GRID_ADDRESS, GRID.GRID_ZIP from :1/GRID GRID where exists(select * from :1/VT01 where VT01_DATE = ':2' and VT01_CLNTNO = 0 and GRID.GRID_ID = VT01_INGGRIDID) for fetch only

select CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO, CLNT806_ING_GRID_ID, CLNT103_COMM_CLNTNO, CLNT114_COUNTRY from :1/clnt join :1/admn admn1 on CLNT101_ADMNO=admn1.ADMN_NO and admn1.ADMN_VORTEXREPORTING = 'Y' where CLNT102_CLNTNO <> 99999 and CLNT102_CLNTNO <> 99998 and CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT <> 2 and CLNT804_TYPEOFINVESTMENT <> 10 and CLNT804_TYPEOFINVESTMENT <> 13 and ( CLNT804_TYPEOFINVESTMENT<> 14 or CLNT804_TYPEOFINVESTMENT = 14 and CLNT103_COMM_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO) and (admn1.ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = 'N' or admn1.ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = 'Y' and exists (select * from :1/SREG where SREG_ID = admn1.ADMN_SREG_ID and SREG_CDD_BUYER = 'Y')) order by CLNT806_ING_GRID_ID, case when CLNT108_ACC_CURR = admn1.ADMN_CURRENCY then CLNT108_ACC_CURR else 'ZZZ' end, CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO for fetch only

Text.val: If INFS_NRN_ABBREVIATION or CLIC908_ID is empty,
then this record must not be written

SQL_STMT_U.val: select GRID.GRID_ID, GRID.GRID_COUNTRY, GRID.GRID_LOCALCUSTOMERID, GRID.GRID_NATIONALREGISTRATIONNR from :1/GRID GRID where exists(select * from :1/VT01 where VT01_DATE = ':2' and VT01_CLNTNO = 0 and GRID.GRID_ID = VT01_INGGRIDID) for fetch only

Text.val: then this record must not be written
